pages.text:
The Buzzing Chicken is an odd species. It prefers the company of flowers, is fuzzy to the touch, and tries to move its wings at unnatural angles.
Lay Item: Deviate Honeycombs!$(br2)Its honeycombs are very different to the ones you got the initial honey from, and smell slightly... eggy.

pages.liquid1tooltip: &7You can use any Fluid Container to fill the cauldron!
